sentences.en: A: You looked downhearted all day. What happened?
sentences.cn: 你一整天看起来都闷闷不乐的样子. 发生什么事了?

sentences.en: Bobby: Kelly, what's wrong? You look so downhearted.
sentences.cn: 鲍比: 凯莉, 怎么了? 你看起来闷闷不乐的.

sentences.en: Don't be too downhearted. There's always a way.
sentences.cn: 别太悲观了，总有办法的。

sentences.en: He failed in being admitted to a university. Even then he was not downhearted.
sentences.cn: 尽管大学没考上,他也毫不气馁.

sentences.en: He was very downhearted about the poor grades he got in school.
sentences.cn: 他对糟糕的学业成绩感到十分沮丧.

sentences.en: I got so downhearted and scared, I did wish I had some company.
sentences.cn: 我心里真沮丧,又害怕的要命, 真盼望有个人来跟我做伴.

sentences.en: Max sighed, sounding even more downhearted.
sentences.cn: 马克斯叹了口气，听上去更沮丧了。

sentences.en: No one would suspect that she had ever been downhearted because of Ashley and Melanie.
sentences.cn: 谁也不会想到她曾经由于艾希礼和媚兰的事而沮丧过.

sentences.en: On the contrary, if criticize simply, deny, child's understanding will is downhearted, deny oneself, lack confidence.
sentences.cn: 相反, 如果一味地批评, 否定, 孩子则会意志消沉, 自己否定自己, 缺乏自信.

sentences.en: Some Brazilians are not altogether downhearted, though.
sentences.cn: 可是,一些巴西人并未完全气馁.

sentences.en: The unpremeditated crime that Picasso commits to oneself is downhearted, should destroy copperplate depict almost.
sentences.cn: 毕加索对自己犯的过失闷闷不乐, 几乎要将铜版刻画一毁了之.

sentences.en: Tom was downhearted, but tried hard not to show it.
sentences.cn: 汤姆虽然也意志消沉, 却尽力不流露出来.

sentences.en: We're disappointed by these results but we're not downhearted.
sentences.cn: 我们对结果感到失望，但是并未丧失信心。

sentences.en: When no replies came, I began to feel downhearted.
sentences.cn: 一点回应都没有，我开始感到灰心了。

trans.tran_cn: 沮丧的，灰心丧气的，衰飒，短气，心灰意冷
trans.tran_en: feeling sad and disappointed, especially because you have tried to achieve something but have failed
